modules.description: Implements Diffie-Hellman key exchange over Curve25519 using C code from Project Everest. It generates key pairs, encodes secrets, and performs key exchange with public keys, returning shared secrets or specific errors like invalid length or low order. Used in TLS 1.3 for secure key agreement and in cryptographic protocols requiring ephemeral key exchanges.

This module implements Ed25519 digital signature operations, including key generation, message signing, and signature verification. It works with private keys, public keys, and messages represented as Cstruct.t buffers. Concrete use cases include securely signing and verifying data in cryptographic protocols or authentication systems.
